pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, February 13, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, February 13, 2016:

Québec City

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and his family will visit Bonhomme’s Ice Palace at the “Carnaval de Québec”.

Bonhomme’s Ice Palace
Across from the Parliament Building
Québec City, QC

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:30 a.m. 

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
